task.title: Remove all Targets
task.shortdesc: Use this feature to remove all <target> elements from your XLIFF file.

step.cmd: In main menu, select View Translation Tasks or click the Translation Tasks option on the left panel.
Type the name and location of the XLIFF file to process in the XLIFF File text box or click the Browse... button to select an XLIFF file from the file system.
Click the Remove all Targets button.
